text: I'm not a robot, but I do have a few questions for you! 🤖🤔 Can you tell me what's going on with the recent browser issues? 😶 I'm having trouble loading some pages and I'm not sure why. 🤷‍♂️ Do you know if it's a problem with my settings or is something else going on? 🤔 Any help would be appreciated! 😊
